content.title: Mukhyamantri Aadharbhut Shiksha Prashikshan Sahayata Yojana
content.details: Labor Department of Chhattisgarh State started this scheme 'Mukhyamantri Aadharbhut Shiksha Prashikshan Sahayata Yojana' for Building and other construction worker on 29 March 2023. The main objective of the scheme is to provide financial assistance for education.
benefits: Free coaching assistance to get the admission for 6th and 9th classes.
eligibility: It is necessary for a registered worker to have regular membership of one year in the board.
The benefit of the scheme will be provided only to the first two children of the registered worker.
The first two children of a registered construction worker possessing the minimum qualification prescribed for the respective competitive examination will be eligible under the scheme.
documents_required: Beneficiary's surviving labor registration identity card
Certificate from the employer verifying the beneficiary's guardian's work experience as a construction worker for at least 90 days within the year preceding the application date.

faqs.question: What is this scheme?
faqs.answer: Chhattisgarh State Government started a scheme 'Mukhyamantri Aadharbhut Shiksha Prashikshan Sahayata Yojana' for Building and other construction worker on 29 March 2023.

faqs.question: What is the objective of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The main objective of the scheme is to provide learning/Coaching assistance for education.

faqs.question: What are the benefits?
faqs.answer: Free coaching assistance to get the admission for 6th and 9th classes.

faqs.question: Who can get the benefits?
faqs.answer: All eligible children of registered construction worker individuals from Chhattisgarh State.

faqs.question: What is the minimum membership eligibility criteria?
faqs.answer: It is necessary for a registered worker to have regular membership of one year in the board.

faqs.question: How many children from the same family will get the scheme benefits?
faqs.answer: The benefit of the scheme will be provided only to the first two children of the registered worker.

faqs.question: What is the duration of coaching?
What is the procedure to apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: Applicant must be registered under 'Chhattisgarh Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board'. Only then the applicant can apply for the scheme.

faqs.question: How to apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: 1. All the applicants have to visit the official website Chhattisgarh Labour Department. 2. On the home page click on 'Apply' under 'Chhattisgarh Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board'. 3. Provide the required details. 4. Fill out the application form. 5. Submit.
